All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CalculateGrossSalaryForEmployeeTest
A test class to verify the calculation of gross salary for an employee.
CalculateNetSalaryAfterDeductionsTest
A test class to verify the calculation of net salary after deductions for an employee.
DatabaseConnectionException
Exception class to handle database connection errors.
DBUtil
Utility class for managing database connections.
Employee
Represents an employee in the system.
EmployeeDao
DAO class for handling Employee entities.
EmployeeNotFoundException
Exception class to handle cases where an employee is not found.
EmployeeService
Provides services related to employee management.
FinancialRecord
Represents a financial record in the system.
FinancialRecordDao
The FinancialRecordDao class handles database operations related to financial records.
FinancialRecordException
Exception class to handle financial record-related errors.
FinancialRecordService
Provides services related to financial records management.
IEmployeeService
 
IFinancialRecordService
The IFinancialRecordService interface defines the contract for accessing and managing financial record data.
InvalidInputException
Exception class to handle cases of invalid input.
IPayrollService
The IPayrollService interface defines the contract for accessing and managing payroll data.
ITaxService
The ITaxService interface defines the contract for calculating and retrieving tax-related information.
Payroll
Represents a payroll record in the system.
PayrollDao
The PayrollDao class provides methods to interact with the database for payroll-related operations.
PayrollGenerationException
Exception class to handle errors that occur during payroll generation.
PayrollService
Provides services related to payroll management.
PayXpertMainClass
 
ProcessPayrollForMultipleEmployeesTest
A test class to verify the processing of payroll for multiple employees.
Tax
Represents a tax record for an employee in a specific tax year.
TaxCalculationException
 
TaxDao
The TaxDao class provides methods to interact with the database for tax-related operations.
TaxService
Provides services related to tax calculations.
VerifyErrorHandlingForInvalidEmployeeDataTest
A test class to verify error handling for invalid employee data.
VerifyTaxCalculationForHighIncomeEmployeeTest
A test class to verify tax calculation for high-income employees.
